channel.title: How do i spawn an npc and make him stay?
channel.description: Ok, there's a guild I just found on my server for ranging but there aren't any npcs there so I wanted to spawn some npcs for people to attack to practice range but when ever I spawn an npc it disappears after I kill it and it doesn't come back. How do I put an npc somewhere and make it so he stays where he is standing and re-appears after you kill it, and I would like it if it would drop something.

item.title: How do i spawn an npc and make him stay?
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

r0ckstar96:

ok, what’s a drop rate?

A percentage, such as 75.

Read full topic

item.source: How do i spawn an npc and make him stay?

item.title: How do i spawn an npc and make him stay?
item.dc:creator: @Sp_Santa Sp Santa
item.description:
@Sp_Santa wrote:

go to your autospawn.cfg and add this:

spawn = monsterid	coordinate	coordinate	0	0	0	0	0	1

remember: do NOT use spaces, but USE tabs!

The 0s are for movement, don’t touch it if u don’t know what you’re doing.

For npcdrops, go to npcdrops.cfg and add:

npcdrop = monster id item id item amount droprate
remember: do NOT use spaces, but USE tabs!

this is for a Delta source, idk about other source should be same.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i spawn an npc and make him stay?
